      • getLeastCommonConcept

        public static int getLeastCommonConcept(ConcRel c1,
                        ConcRel c2,
                        java.util.Set<ConcRel> lcses,
                        java.util.Map<ConcRel,LCSPath> paths)
        Parameters:
        c1 - concept1
        c2 - concept2
        lcses - least common subsumers, required
        paths - paths between concepts via lcses, optional. Key - lcs. Value - 2 element list corresponding to paths to lcs from c1 and c2
        Returns:
        path length, -1 if no lcs
